SELECT TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO AS ASMT_NO , TB_ASMT.ASMT_TTL AS ASMT_TTL , TB_ASMT.ASMT_EXPLN AS ASMT_EXPLN , TO_CHAR(TB_ASMT.ASMT_DDLN, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ASMT_DDLN , TO_CHAR(TB_ASMT.ASMT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ASMT_DT , TB_ASMT.SBJCT_CD AS SBJCT_CD , TB_SBJCT.SVLF_NO AS SVLF_NO , ( SELECT COUNT(TB_STU.STU_NO) FROM TB_SBJCT JOIN TB_STU ON TB_SBJCT.SVLF_NO = TB_STU.SVLF_NO WHERE TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_CD = #{sbjctCd}
) AS STU_ALL_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(TB_QST_SBMSN.STU_NO)) FROM TB_QST_SBMSN JOIN TB_QST ON TB_QST.QST_NO = TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_NO WHERE TB_QST.ASMT_NO = TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO AND TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_YN != 'N' ) AS STU_SBMSN_CNT , ( SELECT DISTINCT(TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_YN) FROM TB_QST_SBMSN JOIN TB_QST ON TB_QST.QST_NO = TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_NO WHERE TB_QST.ASMT_NO = TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO AND TB_QST_SBMSN.STU_NO= #{userNo} ) AS QST_SBMSN_YN FROM TB_ASMT JOIN TB_SBJCT ON TB_SBJCT.SBJCT_CD = TB_ASMT.SBJCT_CD WHERE TB_ASMT.SBJCT_CD = #{sbjctCd} AND TB_ASMT.ASMT_YN ='Y' ORDER BY TB_ASMT.ASMT_DT DESC

SELECT TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO AS ASMT_NO , TB_ASMT.ASMT_TTL AS ASMT_TTL , TB_ASMT.ASMT_EXPLN AS ASMT_EXPLN , TO_CHAR(TB_ASMT.ASMT_DDLN,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ASMT_DDLN , TB_ASMT.ASMT_DT AS ASMT_DT , TB_ASMT.SBJCT_CD AS SBJCT_CD , TB_QST.QST_NO AS QST_NO , TB_QST.QST_CN AS QST_CN , TB_QST.ATCH_FILE_NO AS ATCH_FILE_NO , TB_QST.QST_CODE AS QST_CODE , TB_QST.QST_ANS AS QST_ANS , TB_QST_DTL.QST_DTL_CN AS QST_DTL_CN , TB_QST_DTL.QST_DTL_NO AS QST_DTL_NO , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH , TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_YN AS QST_SBMSN_YN FROM TB_ASMT JOIN TB_QST ON TB_QST.ASMT_NO = TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_QST_SBMSN ON TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_NO = TB_QST.QST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_QST_DTL ON TB_QST_DTL.QST_NO = TB_QST.QST_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATCH_FILE ON TB_QST.ATCH_FILE_NO = TB_ATCH_FILE.ATCH_FILE_NO WHERE TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO = #{asmtNo} AND TB_ASMT.ASMT_YN = 'Y' AND TB_QST.QST_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY TB_QST.QST_NO, TB_ATCH_FILE.ATCH_FILE_SEQ, TB_QST_DTL.QST_DTL_NO

SELECT TB_ATCH_FILE.ATCH_FILE_NO AS ATCH_FILE_NO , TB_ATCH_FILE.ATCH_FILE_SEQ AS ATCH_FILE_SEQ , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_NM AS FILE_NM , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_EXTN AS FILE_EXTN , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_RGTR AS FILE_RGTR , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_BENG_DT AS FILE_BENG_DT , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_UPD_RGTR AS FILE_UPD_RGTR , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_UPD_DATE AS FILE_UPD_DATE , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_TB_NM AS FILE_TB_NM , TB_ATCH_FILE.FILE_THUMB AS FILE_THUMB FROM TB_ATCH_FILE JOIN TB_QST ON TB_QST.ATCH_FILE_NO = TB_ATCH_FILE.ATCH_FILE_NO JOIN TB_ASMT ON TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO = TB_QST.ASMT_NO WHERE TB_ASMT.ASMT_NO = #{asmtNo} ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_NO, ATCH_FILE_SEQ

SELECT TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_NO AS QST_SBMSN_NO , TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_ANS AS QST_SBMSN_ANS , TO_CHAR(TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS QST_SBMSN_DT , TB_QST_SBMSN.STU_NO AS STU_NO , TB_QST_SBMSN.SBJCT_CD AS SBJCT_CD , TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_NO AS QST_NO , TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_YN AS QST_SBMSN_YN FROM TB_QST_SBMSN JOIN TB_QST ON TB_QST.QST_NO = TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_NO WHERE TB_QST_SBMSN.STU_NO = #{userNo} AND TB_QST.ASMT_NO = #{asmtNo} AND TB_QST_SBMSN.QST_SBMSN_YN = 'Y'
